user.title: SaveEcoBot
user.description: Select a city. To find the station ID, open the [SaveEcoBot map]({map_link}) and click on a point â€” check the end of the URL, it will look like `device_xxxxx`.

stations.title: SaveEcoBot stations
stations.description: Select stations to create sensors. Tip: open the [SaveEcoBot map]({map_link}) and look for `device_xxxxx` in the URL.

stations.title: Stations
stations.description: Select stations or use the **Select all stations** switch. Tip: [SaveEcoBot map]({map_link}).
